SELECT u.user_name userName,u.real_name realName ,u.gender gender ,u.born_year,c.com_name,p.pos_name, CASE WHEN u.gender = 1 THEN p.ret_man_money ELSE p.ret_woman_money END reMoney, pu.part_time,u.phone_no,u.hp_user_id,u.header_pic,pu.hp_position_ref_user_id,pu.option_person,pu.option_time,pu.work_on, CASE WHEN pu.option_person != null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END contactStat
from hp_position_ref_user pu left join hp_user u on pu.hp_user_id =u.hp_user_id left join hp_position p on pu.hp_position_id =p.hp_position_id left join hp_company c on p.hp_company_id =c.hp_company_id
WHERE 1=1 AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') AND c.com_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{comName},'%') AND p.pos_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{posName},'%') AND pu.part_time >=#{startTime} AND pu.part_time <=#{endTime} AND u.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%') AND u.gender = #{gender} AND pu.option_person != NULL AND pu.option_person == NULL
ORDER BY part_time desc
select u.* from hp_user u where u.hp_user_id = #{hpUserID}

select u.real_name,u.gender,u.born_year,u.phone_no,u.header_pic, e.edu_name, i.work_area,s.lower_num,s.hight_num,i.pos_type, exp.com_name expComName ,exp.pos_type expPosType ,exp.start_time expStartTime , exp.end_time expEndTime from hp_user_resume r left join hp_education e on e.hp_education_id = r.hp_education_id left join hp_user_intention i on i.hp_user_resume_id = r.hp_user_resume_id left join hp_position_salary_id s on s.hp_position_salary_id = i.hp_position_salary_id left join hp_user_exp exp on exp.hp_user_resume_id = r.hp_user_resume_id left join hp_user u on u.hp_user_id = r.hp_user_id
where r.hp_user_id = #{hpUserID}
select exp.* from hp_user_resume r left join hp_user_exp exp on exp.hp_user_resume_id = r.hp_user_resume_id where r.hp_user_id = #{hpUserID}

select ue.*,e.edu_name from hp_user_resume r left join hp_user_education ue on ue.hp_user_resume_id = r.hp_user_resume_id left join hp_education e on r.hp_education_id =e.hp_education_id where r.hp_user_id = #{hpUserID}
select inte.* from hp_user_resume r left join hp_user_intention inte on inte.hp_user_resume_id = r.hp_user_resume_id where r.hp_user_id = #{hpUserID}
select hp_user_id ,user_name, phone_no ,real_name from hp_user where 1 =1 and user_token = #{userToken}
